name: ipca-api
description: - Retrieve historical IPCA data from Jan-2015 to May-2023;   - Retrieve a specific historical record based on the provided identification code (ID);   - Retrieve historical data for a specific year;     *e.g., all data from the year 2021;*   - Calculate an adjusted value based on the IPCA for the specified period;     *e.g., adjusted value for the period from May-2022 to Feb-2023.*
